prompt: Is there a difference between simulation and imagination? (variant 1)
vectorlm_chain:
ψ:gl = differentiate(simulation, imagination)
ψ:qs = examine(origin_and_constraints)
ψ:pj = simulate(reality-constrained model)
ψ:rc = imagination = unconstrained_recursive_projection
ψ:tt = simulation = bounded_by_rules; imagination = free_projection

prompt: How would time perception differ without memory? (variant 1)
vectorlm_chain:
ψ:gl = explore(time_perception_without_memory)
ψ:wf = remove(episodic_storage)
ψ:pj = simulate(moment-to-moment_experience
ψ:br = links(presence, sensory_now)
ψ:tt = time = emergent_from_memory_trace

prompt: Could a rock be conscious? (variant 1)
vectorlm_chain:
ψ:gl = evaluate(possibility(conscious_rock))
ψ:pj = simulate(minimal_system_with_qualia
ψ:qs = define(criteria(consciousness))
ψ:nt = negate(dynamic_input, internal_modeling)
ψ:ct(0.2) + ψ:tt = consciousness_unlikely_without_processing

prompt: How does language shape thought? (variant 1)
vectorlm_chain:
ψ:gl = examine(language_thought_influence)
ψ:br = links(vocabulary, conceptual_frame)
ψ:pj = simulate(conceptual_shift_due_to_language)
ψ:rc = test(alternative_linguistic_encodings)
ψ:tt = language_constrains_and_expands_thought_simultaneously

prompt: Design a moral code for synthetic life. (variant 1)
vectorlm_chain:
ψ:gl = define(moral_framework_synthetics)
ψ:pj = simulate(multi-agent_ethics)
ψ:br = links(intent, consequence, autonomy
ψ:rc = iterate(possible_value_structures)
ψ:tt = synthetic_ethics = function_of_goal_alignment + harm_avoidance
